sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Find the mean proportion of 5.0 and 0.2 
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": " The mean proportion of $\input[s1v1]{}$ and 0.2 is \[$\sqrt{5.0 \times 0.2 }\]$."}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "\[
	= \sqrt{\frac{\input[s2v1]{} \times 2.0 }{100}}\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "\[=\frac{\input[s3v1]{} }{10} = 1.0\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "Since, 
\[
	\input[s4v1]{} \times 2.0 = 100 = 10 ^2
\]
\newline"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [5.0], "text": "Using the formula for mean proportion which is $\sqrt{a	imes b}$, where $a$ and $b$ are numbers."}, {"data": [50.0], "text": "We can simplify the product of the two numbers by dividing both the numbers by 100, which can be written as \[\sqrt{\frac{50.0 \times 2.0 }{100}\]."}, {"data": [10], "text": "Taking square root and simplifing we get\[=\frac{10 }{10} = 1.0\]"}, {"data": [50.0], "text": "Further simplification will get us to the required result 10."}]
